v8:item.v8:content: Group quantity and unit of measure
Group quantity and unit of measure

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalRetailSales.Ref, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Date, DocumentJournalRetailSales.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Number, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Posted, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentJournalRetailSales.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentJournalRetailSales.ReceiptNumber END AS ReceiptNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type = Type(Document.ProductReturn) THEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Amount * -1 ELSE DocumentJournalRetailSales.Amount END AS Amount, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type FROM DocumentJournal.RetailDocuments AS DocumentJournalRetailSales WHERE DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.Ref = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AND CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type = Type(Document.ShiftClosure) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END ELSE TRUE END AND Not DocumentJournalRetailSales.DeletionMark AND DocumentJournalRetailSales.Posted

v8:item.v8:content: Discount is not available for viewing
Total amount of discount is greater than the amount
Cash register Use without connecting equipment

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentSalesSlip.Ref, DocumentSalesSlip.Number, DocumentSalesSlip.Date, DocumentSalesSlip.Archival, DocumentSalesSlip.DocumentCurrency, DocumentSalesSlip.PriceKind, DocumentSalesSlip.CashCR, DocumentSalesSlip.CashCRSession, DocumentSalesSlip.Comment, DocumentSalesSlip.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentSalesSlip.SalesSlipNumber, DocumentSalesSlip.Company, DocumentSalesSlip.CashReceived, DocumentSalesSlip.StructuralUnit, DocumentSalesSlip.Status, DocumentSalesSlip.DocumentAmount, DocumentSalesSlip.PaymentForm, DocumentSalesSlip.VATTaxation, DocumentSalesSlip.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentSalesSlip.POSTerminal, DocumentSalesSlip.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentSalesSlip.Department, DocumentSalesSlip.Author, DocumentSalesSlip.Responsible, DocumentSalesSlip.DiscountCard, DocumentSalesSlip.DiscountPercentByDiscountCard, DocumentSalesSlip.DiscountsAreCalculated, DocumentSalesSlip.PointInTime, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentSalesSlip.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentSalesSlip.SalesSlipNumber END AS ReceiptNumber FROM Document.SalesSlip AS DocumentSalesSlip WHERE DocumentSalesSlip.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentSalesSlip.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentSalesSlip.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AND DocumentSalesSlip.Posted

SELECT DocumentProductReturn.Ref, DocumentProductReturn.Number, DocumentProductReturn.Date, DocumentProductReturn.Archival, DocumentProductReturn.DocumentCurrency, DocumentProductReturn.PriceKind, DocumentProductReturn.CashCR, DocumentProductReturn.CashCRSession, DocumentProductReturn.Comment, DocumentProductReturn.SalesSlipNumber, DocumentProductReturn.Company, DocumentProductReturn.StructuralUnit, DocumentProductReturn.DocumentAmount, DocumentProductReturn.VATTaxation, DocumentProductReturn.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentProductReturn.SalesSlip, DocumentProductReturn.POSTerminal, DocumentProductReturn.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentProductReturn.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentProductReturn.Department, DocumentProductReturn.Author, DocumentProductReturn.Responsible, DocumentProductReturn.DiscountCard, DocumentProductReturn.DiscountPercentByDiscountCard, DocumentProductReturn.DiscountsAreCalculated, DocumentProductReturn.PointInTime, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentProductReturn.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentProductReturn.SalesSlipNumber END AS ReceiptNumber FROM Document.ProductReturn AS DocumentProductReturn WHERE DocumentProductReturn.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentProductReturn.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentProductReturn.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END
